title: Dear Diary - Et Al.
description: Gidget tries to attract the attention of surfer Jeff. Anne, upset that her little sister is staying out all night, reads her diary and misinterprets its contents.

title: In God, and Nobody Else, We Trust
description: Gidget is unable to find a date for the upcoming luau and convinces her brother-in-law John to accompany her. John tries to fit in with the teenagers, but his behavior puts them off.

title: The Great Kahuna
description: Gidget falls for surfer legend Kahuna and even convinces her father to have him invited over. She soon finds out that Kahuna is, when not on the beach, not that interesting.

title: Daddy Come Home
description: Convinced by his daughter to visit the beach, Russell there becomes infatuated with Sally Combs. Gidget is very worried when he starts dating the woman.

title: Gidget Gadget
description: Feeling neglected by her husband, Anne leaves John. Gidget attempts to bring them back together by signing them up for dancing lessons she has won. However, things don't go the way she planned.

title: A Hearse, a Hearse, My Kingdom for a Hearse
description: Determined to have her own car, Gidget signs a deal with an untrustworthy man and, much to the irritation of her father and classmates, signs up for mechanics in school.

title: Gidget Is a Proper Noun
description: Gidget feels that her teacher Hardy treats her tougher than the other students because she is the daughter of an English professor. She comes up with a scheme, which soon backfires.

title: Image Scrimmage
description: Gidget falls for Larue's sophisticated New Yorker cousin Roger Haimes. Frustrated by Roger treating her as if she were a child, she starts acting as mature as possible.

title: Is It Love or Symbiosis?
description: Feeling her sister isn't ladylike enough, Anne convinces Russell to enroll Gidget in a girls' school in France. Gidget, thinking her father wants back his freedom, pretends she's fine with the decision.

title: All the Best Diseases Are Taken
description: When protest singer Billy Roy Soames comes to town, Gidget gets inspired by his activism. In her own twist, Gidget and Larue get Billy Roy involved in a protest to lower unfair movie ticket prices.

title: My Ever Faithful Friend
description: After Larue gets put down by a girl at the beach, Gidget decides Larue needs a make-over. Larue is more interested in an old horse that she wants to buy. Russ tries to help, and Gidget thinks her friend and her Dad are an item.

title: Chivalry Isn't Dead
description: After a talk with her Dad, Gidget decides that her boyfriend, Mark, needs to learn a little chivalry. Gidget and her girlfriends all gather at her house for a pajama party to teach all their boyfriends a lesson.

title: The War Between Men, Women and Gidget
description: A battle for a new surfing beach causes problems between Gidget and her boyfriend Brett. Gidget uses medical subterfuge to get him back from her rival Patty.

title: Gidget's Foreign Policy
description: Inge, a Swedish college student, stays with the Lawrence's until the dorms open. She changes from meek to wild and steals all the boys - especially Gidget's boyfriend Mark. Gidget fumes until Inga's fianc√© Gunnar shows up.

title: Now There's a Face
description: Gidget becomes the inspiration for photography student Tom Brighton. All goes well until Gidget realizes that she wants to be more than his model.

title: Too Many Cooks
description: While Gidget's true love, Jeff, is away at college, Gidget enjoys herself by dating the feuding Cook cousins. She happily finds out that Jeff, is coming home for the Founder's Day dance, but then realizes she has three dates for the dance.

title: I Love You, I Love You, I Love You, I Think
description: Gidget has a crush on an older surf bum she meets at the beach. All is fine until it turns out he's her new math teacher.

title: Like Voodoo
description: After Gidget's surfboard is stolen she is cursed by the gypsy who is trying to sell it.

title: Gidget's Career
description: Larue starts playing the guitar and Gidget ends up fronting the band.

title: Ego-a-Go-Go
description: Gidget makes a date with Durf the Drag, the class drip, to buck up his ego. She creates an ego-driven monster and he cancels their date.

title: In and Out with the In-Laws
description: Gidget has a luncheon date to meet Jeff's parents for the first time. Mixed-up identities and switched sweaters cause a commotion.

title: We Got Each Other
description: Gidget starts worrying that she and her Dad are too dependent on each other.

title: Operation Shaggy Dog
description: The kid's favorite hang-out, The Shaggy Dog, is in danger of being closed to build a new museum. Gidget and her Dad find themselves on opposite sides of the issue.

title: Ring-a-Ding-Dingbat
description: The Ring-a-Dings, the teen idol group of the moment, are in Los Angeles on mysterious business and Gidget and Larue are determined to meet them.

title: Love and the Single Gidget
description: While her father is out of town Gidget goes to a surfing tournament with her sister and brother-in-law's blessing. They don't quite trust her though and hire a guy to keep tabs on Gidget.

title: Take a Lesson
description: Gidget gets lured out of the house, in her pajamas, to go on a surprise car buying trip to Pasadena. She then spends the whole trip stopping to call her Dad to let him know what's happening.

title: Independence: Gidget Style
description: Gidget gets a job at the new teenage nightclub to pay for a birthday present for her Dad. Unfortunately the family suspects that she is working at someplace a little racier.

title: One More for the Road
description: Gidget gets a job driving a floral delivery truck. There's just one problem - she doesn't have a driver's license.

title: Ask Helpful Hannah
description: Gidget takes over the "Helpful Hannah" teen advice column in the school newspaper to mixed results.

title: A Hard Night's Night
description: When Russ goes out of town Gidget finds herself unknowingly sharing the house with her father's friend.

title: I Have This Friend Who...
description: Gidget and her boyfriend are joined on all of their dates by his lonely father.

title: Don't Defrost the Alligator
description: Gidget freezes the dead pet alligator of the little boy next door neighbor. Gidget's sister makes a frozen dinner. Confusion ensues.
